params.text: Marafiki
Jina langu ni Simo.
Nina marafiki wanne.

params.alt: Amagama abo nguZizo, Lele, Sisa kanye no-Ayanda.
params.title: Amagama abo nguZizo, Lele, Sisa kanye no-Ayanda.

params.text: Majina yao ni Zizo, Lele, Sisa na Ayanda.

params.alt: Umngani wami uZizo uthanda ukudlala ibhola.
params.title: Umngani wami uZizo uthanda ukudlala ibhola.

params.text: Rafiki yangu Zizo anapenda kucheza mpira wa miguu.
Rafiki yangu Lele anapenda kuogelea.

params.alt: Umngane wami uSisa uthanda ukudlala umacashelana.
params.title: Umngane wami uSisa uthanda ukudlala umacashelana.

params.text: Rafiki yangu Sisa anapenda kucheza mchezo wa kujificha.
Rafiki yangu Ayanda anapenda kusoma.

params.alt: Mina? Ngiyathanda ukwenza izinto abathanda ukuzenza.
params.title: Mina? Ngiyathanda ukwenza izinto abathanda ukuzenza.

params.text: Mimi? Ninapenda kufanya vitu wanavyovipenda.
Ninapenda kucheza mpira wa miguu na Zizo.
Ninaogelea na Lele.
Ninacheza mchezo wa kujificha na Sisa.
Ninasoma na Ayanda.
Njoo, rafiki, unapenda nini?
Njoo, ucheze mpira wa miguu na sisi.
Njoo uogelee na sisi.
Njoo, ucheze mchezo wa kujificha na sisi
Njoo usome na sisi
Tunapenda kufurahia na marafiki.

"Marafiki" credits

This work, "Marafiki", is a derivative of "Friends" by Zimbili Dlamini and Hlengiwe Zondi, used under CC BY. "Abangani" is licensed under CC BY 4.0 by Curious Learning.


Book builder - Abraham Jerry Kakooza
